column4: looking for a reason as to why i can't get lucid to find the maverick upgrade
because it's set to only update to LTSes. See the instructions ubottu's about to link you to
Maverick's supported until April 2012. Lucid's supported on desktops until April 2013. Your choice.
basically, if you want to upgrade every six months, upgrade to Maverick. If every two years, stick with LTS
